column5: I am looking for a GPS that can be use for auto(talking kind) and one that I can upload a lake map.  Or I should buy both separately  Any suggestion?  Are lake map quite expensive, can the software be shared from one GPS to another?

I have a LOWRANCE XOG and I'm very happy with it.  As for map lakes, yes you can it's just a SD card.  Go to a store (like radio world) and talk to someone there.  they can help you as the lake map you want might not be out.
